name: Shuffl
author: YaaangaITK
description: A Balatro mod with things I imangined. Some part of the code are largely inspired by other mod I have learned from. The Venom Joker (Concept & Art) is totaly taken from @Squarezum (on X) as I wanted to add a MGS joker but I didn't have a good enought idea at the time.
